column4: How can I remove Samba ??? I'm really having troubles with it
it interfears with samba-common or something
the underprocess pre-removal script returns a 102
Delete all the contents except for the #!/bin/sh line
Just do that, and then remove it, yes.
There might be some files left over that didn't get removed, but it will at least fix apt.
the package acpid and acpi-support are bothering me as well
k... it just fails to set them up... :S
If that fails, you could post the error in #flood
it worked :) thanks a lot... you just saved my sleep :)
